vulnerabilities.title: Inefficient Regular Expression Complexity in vuelidate
vulnerabilities.description: vuelidate is a simple, lightweight model-based validation for Vue.js 2.x & 3.0. A ReDoS (regular expression denial of service) flaw was found in the `@vuelidate/validators` package. An attacker that is able to provide crafted input to the url(input) function may cause an application to consume an excessive amount of CPU.
